sentences.english: A spectrum is then obtained and telemetered to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 然后记录它的光谱，并将数据通过遥测系统发回地面。

sentences.english: This Paper brings forward a new technology of EEG Telemetry .
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一种新型的脑电遥测技术。

sentences.english: The checking and accepting standards of Hydrological Data Acquisition System (HDAS) construction vary with its work mode.
sentences.chinese: 水文遥测系统工作制式不同，系统的验收标准也不同。

sentences.english: Telemetering is one of the ideal methods of metering biomedical signal.
sentences.chinese: 遥测技术是生物信号测量的理想方法之一。

sentences.english: SN388 telemetry instrument is one of complete seismograph in the world.
sentences.chinese: SN388遥测仪是世界上较完善的地震仪器之一。

sentences.english: A method of infrared short range telemetry for torque measurement of rotating shaft is stated.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种对旋转轴扭矩测试的红外近程遥测法。

sentences.english: An essential part of bio-telemetry encompasses the transmission of data.
sentences.chinese: 生物遥测术的一个基础的部分包括，传输数据。

sentences.english: It is absolutely necessary to demodulate the time-coordinated signal for a real-time system.
sentences.chinese: 对于一个实时的遥测系统，时统解调是必不可少的。

sentences.english: At last, the . remote measure technology of cylinder pressure's parameters.
sentences.chinese: 最后研究了气缸压力等参数的遥测技术。

sentences.english: The simulation results give references to design reentry remote sensing system rationally in engineering application.
sentences.chinese: 该文为工程应用中合理设计再入遥测系统提供了参考。

sentences.english: Based on the characteristics of telemetric phase sensitive signal, two practical demodulation schemes are introduced .
sentences.chinese: 根据遥测相敏信号特点，介绍两款实用解调方案。

sentences.english: At the test chamber, the FVC circuit resumes the signal.
sentences.chinese: 文章给出了信号遥测的电路设计。

sentences.english: The model matches the satellite image quite well.
sentences.chinese: 模型结果与卫星遥测非常接近。

sentences.english: This echoes what has happened to motor-racing telemetry.
sentences.chinese: 这些系统模仿了过去在赛车场合出现的遥测装置。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the renovation of water regime forecasting system of Feilaixia hydro project.
sentences.chinese: 主要讲述了飞来峡水情遥测预报调度系统的改造工作。

sentences.english: Data transmission is the base of Telemeter Seismographic Network.
sentences.chinese: 数据传输是遥测地震台网的运行基础之一。

definition: ground control (of airborne or space operation)

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 ding4 wei4 xi4 tong3
